title: ₱ - The philippine peso sign design
content:
**What's the correct one?** I thought it was the first one, but I saw a lot of (well designed) typography with the second sign. Thanks

1 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420045213im_/http:/origin.myfonts.net/114/fs/u/16/04aedb2423db862221c4dd9ea9cac2.gif) 2 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420045213im_/http:/origin.myfonts.net/116/fs/u/c0/aad1a93df6391bed2b07605d2ced58.gif)
author: ferfolio_2

comments.content:
1 is the correct Philippine peso.  
2 is a popular (but unofficial and unencoded as of yet) sign for the Russian ruble.

Now it all fits together, it seems that some designers use the philipine peso Unicode instead...

Thanks! :)
